public class LoginValidation {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
				 String id="admin";
				 int password=123;
				 if(id=="admin")

		if(password==123 ){      
	        if(id=="admin"){    
	            System.out.println("id and password is valid login sucessful");    
	        } else{  
	            System.out.println("id and password is invalid login unsucessful");    
	        }
		}   
	}

}
